name: Spaaace
description:
Fight for survival in spaaace. Shoot the enemies, collect coins and buy upgrades. Can you defeat the epic final boss?

This is a project I've been working on in my spare time, I liked the challenge of creating everything you need to make a game myself (sprites, animations, code, music,...). I learned a lot and had a ton of fun. I hope to use the knowledge and experience I gained from this to make more advanced and interesting games in the future. Plenty of ideas, just need the time to work them all out.

Spaaace might not be the best looking game and the programming is poorly optimised. It ain't much, but it's honest work :)

Thanks for checking out my game
